Blog.post: On a better note! Tomorrows delivery includes. The Best of Insomniac, Vol 1 The Best of Insomniac, Vol 2, Disc 1&2 Woo hoo..... And Jerod moved in today, so free rent for July, YES!

I just keep being reminded that I should have stayed at Hertz, I did great there always top sales, always went to the award dinner, free lunch for sales. I just don't wan to let my partents know that they are right.... Back to the previous, oh I don't have a CC, well neither do I, but it must be my fault that you don't have one too, right?? DAMN IT!

I have never been SO freaking frustrated with a job, but I am! I give the rebuttal and the people are like "no seriously, I have no money", and I get faulted for this. Is it my fault that they have no money, well it must be. "I am sorry that you are on welfare in a wheelchair, and have no legs, BUT if you could just give me your CC information, I will help you solve the problem" Somehow this is all my fault and I will lose my job, this SUCKS! FUCKING SHIT!
Netflix, baby! Band of Brothers Linkin Park in Texas Anyone want a copy!
Okay, I wanna go to the movies and see Spider Man 2. There are three showing tomorrow 12:01, 12:02, & 12:03. Which one will it be? Call my cell...

I just want to go home and stay in side.... not in the cube! jay
Now not only do I hate AOL I also have reason to hate The Beastie Boys and their virus spreading asses!
The true spawn of satan... Now this is one merit badge that I could have earned...

Just in case you didn't already know, DO NOT INSTALL AOL ON YOUR COMPUTER. AOL is a virus and will change settings on your computer and will fuck it up. And then you will call India and they will transfer you to me and I will call you a dumbass! Thank you for playing, this is concludes the test of the bitching system had this been a real emergency, all of the above would have been listed in caps. Thank you, Jay

Is this place the spawn of the devil? You go in there just to buy a gift card and end up spending lots of money on your self... What the f**k? I have no money.. it must be that music that they play while you are in there.... it's like... .you know you want to buy a game, oh and a movie, oh shit get a cd while your at it, SATAN DEVIL 666 BAD, BAD!! SHIT! -js

... anyway... here is the best website for downloading stuff illegally. urlLink SuprNova.Org you can get movies, music, etc...... ENJOY! Oh but you will need bittorrent so go to urlLink BitTornado ! Once again Enjoy! -smipf

Ok, this is the real question! Should I stay at work or go to northgate, Jerod and Jared are like just go home and come to Northgate, but I have NO money so I really cannot go...If Chris ever gets out of the bathroom I am going to ask to go home! WHERE IS HE!

Well you have hear me complain about my job for the last few days, but you know the job is really good all I do I talk to people who have the worlds largest ISP and don't know how to use a computer. It is always dumb stuff to "My screen says non-system disk error, what do I do?" "Uh, dumb ass eject the floppy and hit any key to continue, that will be $39.99, Thank you for calling. DOne At Home!" And the other great thing about to day is that it rained and flooded C.S,but isn't it great when it rains you can just sleep 'til 1:30 and have no worries in the world. Oh even better news Wendy got a job back on Capital Hill so she will be back making no money, but doing something that she really likes. I have never been happier for her. Well enough for now time to do laundry and finish the big clean. -smipf
So bored!

Well I am officially broke again, does any one want to donate?
Buckwheat says "OTAY!" So here is how it is I am still bored at work I am trying my best to sell these people on the service and I have at about 50%, way to go me!

we'll here is the new blog... I started a new job and am really bored.
well just about everyone has moved... Josh and Tesia moved to Florida. Jerod moved to Dallas. Chris moved to Houston. Just about everyone is gone, damn time to move...
I have a job after Saturday!!! I just found out that I am moving to the Medion contract and start training on Monday! WHOOP!

Ok one and all, I need to find a job... I am not currently unemployed but I need to get caught up on my bills and I just can't do that where I work. Or at least not for the contract that I am currently on, I need to be on one of those high dollar contracts where they pay the big bucks!
You wanna buy some drugs.... I need some break pads! I didn't know that advanced auto now sells hash, for their valued customers.
urlLink CLICK HERE!!!

Today we might find out if we get to keep our jobs on another contract or if we all get to go to the unemployemnt office together?! urlLink Who if work for.... urlLink what contract I hate.... urlLink what contract I want to work for.... urlLink what contract I might end up on.... I am just hoping to keep the dang job at this point!!
I am trying this new browser because I am currenlty being anti-Microsoft. You should try it too! urlLink Firefox by Mozilla
This was by far the best toy when I was little. You had the ones that would follow the black pen or the red pen and you could make then wreck into each other! urlLink Buy these for me!

Uh, I didn't mean to use your credit card it just looked just like mine!
Damn crazy betters!

Today I really wanted to go to Panda Express and try the new chinese food, but as soon as I went to park there was one of the people that I really didn't want to see. OUR MANGER! (oh wait not our mgr, the person that thinks he is our mgr) So I had to go to "Joy Ruck, How I helpa yooou?" The fortune that was with the food was by far the worst ever ! "In GOD we trust, all others pay cash" oh and it was in spanish too at the chinese restaurant? " En DIOS confiamos, los demas pagan en efectivo" Yes it was in italics too. I bet that if you played to loto numbers on the back you would have to pay the loto winnings! "And tonights losing numbers are.... 6... 5... 14... 33... 36... and 49! If you got all 6 numbers right please come and pay us 10 milions dollars!"

Just exactly who invented alcohol and why did they include something in it that makes you feel like shit the next day. You would think that they were like... "you know what you be really funny, let's make this stuff that is fun to drink, but make you vomit or just hurt the next day! tee hee hee!" Those of you that know Lauren will understand this... "I'm done with this drink" and then throw it across the room. Another thing that makes perfect sense.
8:21 P.M. BRYAN, TX, US DEPARTURE SCAN 8:43 P.M. HOUSTON, TX, US ARRIVAL SCAN I just sent something via ups and just exactly when did houston and bryan end up 20 minutes apart? just confused.......

Well lets see I might not have a job after July 31st, BUT I have Jeff working his Jewish magic to get me transfered to a new contract. Everyone cross your fingers! Last time I didn't have a job I went to D.C. and took pictures next to the word "UNEMPLOYMENT" Wendy thought this would be humorous.
urlLink TwelveFifteen.com | Fuck work in its stupid ass! : "FIVE POINT DARES " We are gonna need you to go ahead and move you desk as far back as possible... that would be great !
urlLink OldVersion.com You know what being cracked out at 5 am it is still good that I can suggest this wonderful site!

and the ass fucking begins... oh you didn't get a chance to choose a schedule so you get to work from 8pm-5am. ISN'T THAT GREAT!! wait ok now it's Thursday-Monday 2-10:30pm... and that isn't too bad but we are losing the contract so I have to find a new job anyway... Well I also was accepted to Sam Houston for the 3rd time, ut this time I am going to finish. urlLink SHSU
urlLink Man Sues McDonald's Over Lack of Warning Against Forceful Burger Eye Insertion Are you kidding me?
Well third week at work and I am once again at less than 25% ; but Lee has 50% . Fuck that shit! 50 calls 200 phone calls.... the more calls you take the less successful you will be. Fucking SHIT!
YEAH!

I just spent the last 3 hours cleaning the carpets in my apartment. Jerod Schneider's dog is nasty.... I cleaned the carpets in that room 3 different times and it still smells like dirty old dog... Hope it disperses before Jared moves in..... blah!
I am building a computer, cheap computer to use as a media pc, video, audio, etc. So what do you suggest I use to build this pc. I wanna use it to replace my replaytv, but to play mp3s too! HELP!
I only FUBAR'd one computer and sent out a box and a monitor. Not a bad day so far.

Has anyone else seen these retarded ass commercials... 1st fat lady says "Oh your fat and must be having a baby... " 2nd lady says "I'm not pregnant!" 1st lady replys "Oops your not pregnant, uh thank you" This is by far the dumbest commercial ever. Have you seen those A&E shows "Growing up Gotti" or "Airline" these shows are not good but you can't stop watching them. I watched Airline for like 3 hours the other day, and I couldn't stand the show just couldn't turn it off.
Thursday - Monday 10:00 am - 6:30 pm

Newest update, we finished training, all in all, way to go Brian, we were the worst behaved group of people, I would have hap a mental breakdown if I was having to do it. But anyway done with training will take calls on monday, wish me luck!
What am I doing... nothing b/c I have $9 to last until next Friday and I took a really long nap, from like 7-11, oops!
Thank goodness... only one more day of training... I want to start taking calls but I am still in the wrong queue and my computer is a piece. DAMNIT!

I might have to kill some people before the training is over.... I think that I could probably take calls now with just a little bit of help. There are some people in the training that even if you spoon fed the information to them, oh right that is what Brian is doing, they STILL wouldn't understand anything. Damn it four more days!
THREE HOURS AND THIRTY MINUTES!!!

I might be made fun of for this post, but... what am I thinking I am the only one that reads this, so when the hell cares. If anyone else is reading this, I have a good recomendation for a cartoon for you to watch, yeah I said you! Naruto! urlLink Naruto Fan urlLink Got Woot! If you wanna watch this you will also need to download urlLink bittornado and urlLink MegaCodec so that you can view the files. ENJOY!!

I am working on redoing my resume, anyone wanna help I'll email you a copy and you can help me fix it. The solution to yesterday's post.... Happy that is step one. Be more active. Drink less! Just try and be happy. Take better care of myself. Happy did I mention that? Be nicer, and not get walked on by others! Here in about two days this is all going to be just crap that I wrote and never took a second look at...

Does anyone else know how depressing it is when just about everyone has moved and you only have one friend left in town, and everyone is moving on and doing something with their life and I am still in College Station being a bum and not doing anything with my life, being extremely in debt and having no money to catch up on that debt, I really just want to move somewhere and start a new life and forget about everything, it would be just great to just move somewhere..... Way to go josh and tesia wish I could do it
